name: DeltaStar Earth Defence (ZX Spectrum Next) Digital Download
name_original: DeltaStar Earth Defence (ZX Spectrum Next) Digital Download
description:
They came wave after wave in a relentless attack upon mankind with one purpose, to destroy everything!

Jump aboard the top secret hyper star fighter 'Project DeltaStar' and pilot your way to victory. 

Armed to the teeth, you will face the insect like aliens and bosses that are approaching from deep space.

Only the best star pilots will survive the onslaught. Action stations Captain, the invasion has begun!

Features:

* Intense arcade action.
* Weapon power-ups.
* Many space themed stages.
* Multiple boss stage battles.
* Vibrant pixel graphics.
* Addictive gameplay.

Visit us:

www.spectrumnextgames.com
